articles.title: Nicholas Rossi: Judge rules ‘Arthur Knight’ is American fugitive found in Glasgow hospital - STV News
articles.description: Judge rules man is convicted sex attacker who's thought to have faked his own death.
articles.content:
A judge has ruled that a man found in a Glasgow hospital is an American wanted for rape.
Convicted sex attacker Nicholas Rossi, or Alahverdian, was arrested just before Christmas last year while bei… [+3535 chars]
